Question: Following this success, this person wrote magazine articles and a regular column for The Boston Globe newspaper.
Hints: All of this person's books during this time stemmed from the television series of the same names.
Julia Carolyn **** (née McWilliams; August 15, 1912 – August 13, 2004) was an American chef, author, and television personality.
This person translated the French into English, making the recipes detailed, interesting, and practical.
